## Carga de datos

Hi hi hi

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r, include=TRUE}
load("C:/Users/cvill/Workspace/Spotify-Playlist/beats.RData")
beats <- beats
beats <- beats[!duplicated(beats$track_id),]
beats[beats == ""] <- NA
beats <- beats[complete.cases(beats$track_id),]
glimpse(beats)
```

```{r, include=TRUE}
beats_attributes <- select(beats, danceability,energy,loudness,speechiness,acousticness,instrumentalness,liveness,valence,tempo)
glimpse(beats_attributes)
```
